solution_line_template: Across all of the lottery tickets, Tony has a total of {num_lottery_tickets} lottery tickets * {winning_numbers_per_ticket} winning numbers per lottery ticket = <<{num_lottery_tickets}*{winning_numbers_per_ticket}={total_winning_numbers}>>{total_winning_numbers} winning numbers.

Across all the numbers, he has won a total of {total_winning_numbers} winning numbers * ${value_per_winning_number} per winning number = $<<{total_winning_numbers}*{value_per_winning_number}={total_money_won}>>{total_money_won}.
